Asteroid designations ( Number, Name, Temporary designation): 2270, Yazhi,  1980 ED, J80E00D, 1952 DM1, J52D01M, 1958 FD, J58F00D, 1970 LF, J70L00F, 1971 TF2, J71T02F, 1976 QH, J76Q00H, 1976 SE, J76S00E, 1977 SV1, J77S01V, 1977 UD1, J77U01D
Observation was done on (UT) (format YYYY-MM-DD-hh): 2012 - 12 - 18 - 23:58
Observation was made by : Fornasier Sonia E-mail; sonia.fornasier@obspm.fr
At observatory with UAI code: 950
Obsv. comments: uploaded by Simon Anghel
The spectrum was published in the article: http://adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2016Icar..269....1F
The normalization of this spectrum was made for the wavelength: 0.550 microns.
Original name of the file was: 2270_Yazhi
